name: Nikos Isofidou
story: Nikos Isofidou grew up in a small village in Greece. He was always a skilled marksman, and after graduating from high school he decided to enroll in the Greek army. He quickly rose up the ranks and was selected for a special forces unit. After serving in several overseas deployments, Nikos was recruited by NATO and assigned to the BLUFOR faction in the ongoing conflict in Altis. He is known for his skill in long-range sniping, and his confidence and determination under pressure make him an invaluable asset to his team.
